enum: (1) (a) national legislation considered relevant to the prevention of introduction of invasive alien species and control
(1) (b) national biodiversity strategy and action plan (nbsap) targets alignment to aichi biodiversity target 9 set out in the strategic plan for biodiversity 2011-2020
agreement on sanitary and phytosanitary measures of the world trade organisation
convention on international trade in endangered species
convention on the conservation of migratory species of wild animals
international convention for the control and management of ship's ballast water and sediments

title: Proportion of countries adopting relevant national legislation and adequately resourcing the prevention or control of invasive alien species
